title: A detailed interpretation of shooting in a dream

preview.html: Interpreting shooting in a dream in detail, shooting bullets or archery is a sport that involves shooting at a target and was recommended by the Prophet, as he said: “Teach your children swimming, shooting, and horse riding. They use different weapons and ammunition, and at this time they have learned to use weapons in large government institutions for self-defense and the nation, and in this article we will learn in detail the interpretation of shooting in a dream. Interpretation of seeing shooting in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing bullets in a dream indicates People in general. As for the person who thought he was leading, this is an indication that a lot of money was going his way. In the event that lead is considered melted or melted, this is evidence of a major loss of money for the pioneer. If one dreams of melting lead, this indicates disagreement The dreamer is with someone close to him and may fall into a problem that makes him vulnerable to what people say. Also, shooting a gun in a dream indicates the dreamer’s need to bear the obstacles and problems he faces. As for the one who sees himself as the one who shoots people, this means his hatred for people in general, and that he He feels hatred and envy towards them. However, if a woman sees a gunshot wound on her body in a dream, this is evidence that her reputation will be affected, or that she does not have a good reputation among the people and those around her, or it may be an indication of her seriousness. . The unhappiness felt by a girl who suffers a lot in her life from many sorrows and problems. If the bullet hits his head, this is evidence of many problems, fears, and difficulties in the fortuneteller’s life that will continue with him for some time. Interpretation of seeing a bullet wound in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation. The scholar Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi had a different opinion about seeing bullets in general in a dream, because it indicates the acquisition of money. Illegal and illegal. But he agreed with Ibn Sirin in interpreting bullets that they represent human beings in general. And for anyone who thinks that he is receiving bullets, this is evidence that he took money and earned it in an illegal or legal way. But if the dreamer finds frozen lead in his dream, this indicates Lots of money and abundant savings for the person who sees it and will not be affected by any crisis and will not be affected by any harm. Reversing the vision of molten lead is a sign of loss and loss of money. As for whoever sees himself taking up leadership as a profession or working in it, it is an indication of the weakness of the dreamer’s personality and that he suffers from a flaw or weakness and does not have the ability to deal with his problems. In some cases, it could be The evidence serves as a warning to the pilot to be careful or investigate what he says. Interpretation of seeing a bullet wound in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen agreed with Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin that seeing bullets in a dream is a sign of a lot of money. If the fortuneteller sees himself melting lead, this is a sign of... The fortuneteller is on a path that brings with him a lot of profits and abundant money. As for lead that is healthy or stagnant, it indicates the abundance of money and the huge food that comes to the fortuneteller. Seeing lead in a dream can be a sign of sadness and anger.

title: Interpretation of stealing shoes when leaving the mosque in a dream

preview.html: A single woman dreams of stealing shoes from the mosque. Ibn Sirin mentioned in his interpretation that stealing shoes while leaving the mosque is an indication of the dreamer’s insistence on disobedience, so his reward will be of the same type as his work, so he must repent and return to his Lord. Explain this vision to the single woman, but she lacks the obligatory worship that makes her feel inferior in her affairs. Religious. Married and pregnant women, when seen in a dream, declare that they are walking among people with chatter and gossip. They are among the actions that God has forbidden, so they must stop and return to God as a reward for the same action. Interpretation of a dream about losing shoes in the mosque for men. Ibn Sirin indicates the interpretation of this The vision for a man contains warnings for the man to abandon prayer or fail to perform it, as he loses his shoes in the mosque. Evidence of the confusion he falls into if he does not maintain his prayers. A man loses his shoes in the mosque in a dream and searches for them without benefit in finding them. This indicates that it is permissible for him to divorce him. His wife due to family problems between them or the loss of one of his children. Search for him. He lost his shoes during his sleep. When he leaves the mosque after searching for him, he promises that he will overcome the adversities and obstacles that he faced in the last period of his life and his situation will change for the better. Interpretation of the dream of losing shoes and wearing another shoe. This dream indicates that its owner He will lose something of great value to him. You will never see or possess it after losing it. Some scholars interpreted this as a prediction that the dreamer will be exposed to a scandal that cannot be covered up. He has lost one of his shoes without the other, and searching for it is in vain. It indicates the expected loss that the viewer will experience In his money or transactions. Losing shoes in a dream in a deserted place is a sign of poverty and serious financial crises. She is married when she sees her. Losing shoes. Wearing others explains the change in the current social situation. Exposing her to problems between her and her husband that disturb her family life. Interpretation of taking off shoes and losing them. Taking off shoes in a dream Losing it indicates a change in status from health to illness, or from wealth to poverty, or from gain to loss, and other things that indicate a change in status. It indicates that the person with insight does not possess in his personality the things that help him act in certain annoying situations that he encounters in his life. Professional.An indication that the dreamer will experience the loss of one of his relatives who enjoys all respect, respect, and high value in the dreamer’s life.Interpretation of a dream about returning shoesRecovering lost shoes in a dream indicates to the single woman that she will return to her fiancé who left her and the problems that led to this separation will be solved.For the married woman, It is interpreted as the collapse of the family problems that disturbed her life in the past. And the return of stability and love between her and her husband, her partner. Retrieving a shoe in a dream from a divorced woman indicates that she will return to her husband after resolving the problems that led to her divorce, for fear of losing her children. Or having a husband. Another reason for the return of psychological stability in her professional life. When a man takes back his shoes in a dream, this indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about marriage by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Watching the wedding of single people, for married people, for pregnant women, for divorced women, whether without the groom or the bride, attending the wedding, buying a dress and more by Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi and Imam al-Sadiq. Interpretation of marriage in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The dream of seeing a wedding in a dream indicates joy and happiness. When a person sees a wedding in a dream, he feels With optimism and satisfaction, he wants to know the interpretation of this dream. - (The wedding) in a dream. If there are guitars and musicians, a person dies in the place where the wedding is being held (and whoever sees) that he will get married, and he did not see the bride, and she was not described to him, and his name was not mentioned, then he will die. Interpretation Wedding in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is marrying a handsome, handsome young man who seems cheerful and happy, this means that she will soon marry a good young man and live a happy and peaceful life with her husband. However, if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is marrying an old man, and he shows signs of gray hair and illness, and in the dream she shows signs of sadness and unhappiness, this means that she will be exposed to many problems. Whether at work or with her family. But if an unmarried woman sees that she is getting married but she looks sad and sad and is wearing a black dress, this may indicate that she will suffer a lot in her life or it may indicate illness. Interpretation of attending a wedding in a dreamIf a woman sees that she is attending a wedding She and everyone present seemed happy and cheerful, as this indicates goodness for her and that she will hear good news that will make her very happy. However, if a woman sees that she is going to a wedding and looks sad and jealous of the bride, this indicates that she will go through a difficult period in her life and will suffer from sadness and depression. Interpretation of a wedding in a dream for a man: If a man sees in a dream that he will get married while he is already married, this means that he will live with his wife a life full of love and affection. And if a man sees that he will get married while he is happy and not married, this indicates that soon he will be associated with a beautiful and kind girl and he will live a happy life with her. Peaceful. Interpretation of a wedding in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is marrying a stranger and feels fear and confusion, this means that she will go through a difficult period full of problems, difficulties, and disagreements with her husband, and she may not be able to end these differences. But if a married woman sees that she is marrying a man she does not know And she wears a black dress while she is sick, this indicates that she will suffer greatly from illness and may end in death. But if a married woman sees that she is attending the wedding of her relative or her children and feels happy, this is good news and happiness for her. YouTube Interpretation of marriage in a dream Seeing the groom in a dream - YouTube

When a person sees a wedding in a dream, he feels optimistic and comfortable and wants to know the interpretation of this dream. - (Wedding) in a dream, if there are guitars and musicians, a person dies in the place where the wedding is held (and whoever sees) that he will marry, and he did not see the bride, and she was not described to him, and his name was not mentioned, he dies. Interpretation of a wedding in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is marrying a handsome, handsome young man who seems cheerful and happy, this means that she will soon marry a good young man and live a happy and peaceful life with her husband. As for if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is marrying an old man, and signs of gray hair and illness appear on him, and signs of sadness and misery appear on her in the dream, this means that she will be exposed to many problems. Whether at work or with her family. As for if an unmarried woman sees that she is getting married but she looks sad and sad and wearing a black dress, this may indicate that she will suffer a lot in her life or it may indicate illness. Interpretation of attending a wedding in a dream If a woman sees that she is attending a wedding and she and all the attendees look happy and cheerful, this indicates goodness for her and that she will hear good news that will make her very happy. As for if a woman sees that she is going to a wedding and she looks sad and jealous of the bride, this indicates that she will go through a difficult period in her life and will suffer from sadness and depression. Interpretation of a wedding in a dream for a man If a person sees in a dream that he will get married and he is already married, this means that he will live with his wife a life full of love and affection. And if a man sees that he is getting married and he is happy and unmarried, this indicates that he will soon be associated with a beautiful and kind girl and will live a happy and peaceful life with her. Interpretation of a wedding in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees that she is marrying a stranger and feels fear and confusion, this means that she will go through a difficult period full of problems, difficulties and disputes with her husband and may not be able to end these differences. As for If a married woman sees that she is marrying a man she does not know and wearing a black dress while she is sick, this indicates that she will suffer greatly from illness and may end in death. However, if a married woman sees that she is attending the wedding of her relative or children and feels happy, this is good news and happiness for her. title: Interpretation of a dream about love and respect

preview.html: The detailed interpretation of the dream of dyeing hair for single and pregnant women is the topic that we decided to present on the upper site today, as seeing dyed hair is one of the visions that are often asked about its interpretation, and as agreed upon in the previous article, dreams differ in details according to male or female and male or female. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about dyeing hair for single and pregnant women in detail. Interpretation of a dream about dyeing hair for single and pregnant women in detail. Seeing hair dyes in dreams is a blessing and blessing for the dreamer, and praise indicates a better change in the dreamer’s life. Does the interpretation of sleep differ if the color of the dyed hair differs in the dream? the dream? The answer is yes.” It will be covered in the next line, so stay tuned. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about dyeing hair for a single woman. Ibn Sirin says that dyeing hair in a woman’s dream is generally good news and a sign of joy and happiness, and the details vary from one vision to another. If a woman sees: A young man dyeing her hair, especially red, indicates her imminent entry into a romantic relationship and that the prospects of imminent marriage please God. But if she sees a single woman dyeing her hair black as a warning of the failure of a romantic relationship, she should be aware of such relationships and not waste time. In lost relationships. The dream of an unmarried woman dyeing her hair blonde indicates that she is about to marry a high-ranking young man and the emergence of something that God wants to bring happiness to her heart. Seeing long hair dyed light brown is good news and evidence of a long and happy life, and this dream is not only For single people, but for everyone who has the same vision. If you see an unmarried girl dyeing her hair yellow, this may be a sign of envy and illness, God forbid. See also: Backgrounds in a dream. Interpretation of dyeing hair in a dream for a married woman. Ibn Sirin said in his interpretation of his dream for a married woman She dyed her hair in a dream: When she sees her dyeing her hair brown, this is a sign of a stable and happy family life, in her vision – good money and abundance that she will have in the coming days. If a woman is struggling to get pregnant, then seeing brown hair is the news of her upcoming pregnancy and a response To invite her. Dreaming of black hair for a married woman is a sign of a stable marriage and strong love for her husband. Her eyes will be happy and her heart will be happy. In interpreting the dream of a pregnant woman with blond hair in a dream, Ibn Shirin says that this is evidence of food and very good and that her life will be better and God heralds good news for this woman. The blond hair of a pregnant woman in a dream can indicate that she will give birth at any time. time, so you must be prepared.It is a bad dream for a woman to see h

title: Interpretation of seeing chickens in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing chicks by Ibn SirinSeeing chicks in a dream is a sign of wealth and many good things that the dreamer will obtain. Chicks in a dream is evidence of the dissolution of anxiety. Seeing chicks in a dream is a sign of happy news. Chicks are an indication of good offspring. A dream of chicks indicates in A dream indicates a lot of money. Seeing small chicks in a dream means joy and happiness. Whoever sees dead chicks in a dream, this indicates anxiety and sadness. Whoever sees the death of chicks in a dream and is in a romantic relationship, it will fail or indicate a break in the engagement. Chickens in a dream are evidence of... The good reputation of the fortuneteller. If one sees that he is laying out food for the chicks, this indicates a happy family life. Anyone who sees this chick indicates that this is an investigation into something that the fortuneteller has been waiting for for a long time. Seeing a slaughtered chick in a dream means family disputes. A white chick in a dream It is the other half and it could be marriage. Seeing a black chick is evidence that money is forbidden. Seeing many colorful chicks is a sign of good luck and a life full of joy, pleasure, a lot of food and a lot of money. Interpretation of seeing chicks for a single woman: Free When she sees in a Gotopula dream, this indicates the fulfillment of The desires that she wants. If an unmarried woman sees a chick emerging from the egg, this is evidence of her marriage in the near future. Chicks in a dream are evidence of a single woman entering a happy married life. Interpretation of seeing chicks for a married woman. Chicks in a dream for a married woman indicate her husband’s love for her. If A married woman sees chicks emerging from eggs, then she will be pregnant. If a woman sees that she plays with chicks, she will have children. Seeing a girl breastfeeding a chick indicates psychological comfort and security in married life. Interpretation of seeing chicks for a pregnant woman. Chicks in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate the presence of a large number of children. And offspring. Seeing a pregnant chick is evidence of the safety of her pregnancy. Seeing chicks emerging from eggs is a sign of difficulty in childbirth. Interpretation of seeing chicks for a man: Whoever sees in a dream a chick emerging from eggs, this indicates his wife’s pregnancy. If a man sees a group of chicks in a dream, this is a sign On safety and comfort. Interpretation of dreams about chicks emerging from eggs. Interpretation of dreams about chicks emerging from eggs. There are many indicators. Chicks in a dream indicate an abundance of kindness and food. Therefore, a chick hatching from an egg is evidence of the extensive nutrition that the dreamer will receive from a man or a woman. According to the different social status of married people. Or unmarried people, the hatching of a chick may indicate the presence of a new child. Or it indicates the abundance of money that the head of the family will receive, which will change the course of his family and his social life for the better. Interpretation of a dream about chicks for a pregnant woman: A dream about chicks for a pregnant woman has connotations of joy and happiness and may indicate The arrival of a happy baby that makes the family rejoice, and this birth may be a boy. Perhaps some explain this to the ease and convenience of giving birth to a pregnant woman, so she does not feel pain, but rather feels awake.

title: Interpretation of my mother’s dream of consulting my hair in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my mother consulting my hair in a dream Each of us searches for what our dreams mean, so we learn in the following lines about the interpretation of my mother’s dream about consulting my hair in a dream and more.Interpretation of my mother’s dream about consulting my hair in a dreamInterpretation of my mother’s dream about consulting my hair in a dream We did not find specific interpretations to see that, however Seeing a hair dryer in a dream could be a sign of nourishment, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a hair dryer in a dream, this may indicate bad news. And God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees in a dream consulting her hair, it could be a sign of goodness and happiness, God willing. God.Interpretation of dreams of my fiancé combing my hair in a dream.Interpretation of a dream of my fiancé combing my hair in a dream. Combing hair can indicate goodness and happiness, God willing. If an unmarried woman cannot remove the hair from her leg and seeks help from her mother to remove it, she is too weak to solve her problems and treat them on her own and will resort to someone older than her in age and experience to help her get rid of these problems. If the dreamer's leg is black and full of hair in a dream, and when he pulled out the hair from it, he saw that its color had turned white and its external appearance became beautiful and impressive, then the vision indicates the dreamer's stopping. Practicing any sins that distance her from God, she repents to the Lord of the Worlds for what she has done of past sins, and her repentance is pure and sincere for the sake of God Almighty. The dreamer's leg hair If she was embarrassed in a dream because it was long and extended on her legs, but she removed it and felt pain during that, and later she discovered that the shape of her legs had changed and become more beautiful, then she will soon face problems, and she will not escape from them again, and the important thing is that it will be exhausting and exhausting, but you will gain stability later. Ibn Sirin said that if the dreamer's leg becomes soft and beautiful after removing hair from it in a dream, then the scene indicates the removal of all the crises that she suffered in the past. title: Interpretation of a dream about a red dress by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a red dress: A red dress in a dream is one of the things that the viewer enjoys seeing a lot, especially if it is very beautiful and happy when looking at it. A woman or girl can see a long or short red dress and the indications vary accordingly, and the dress she sees can be elegant or otherwise and therefore varies. The meanings associated with it, and in our article we want to emphasize the meaning of a dream about a red dress. Interpretation of a dream about a red dress: If the red dress that the dreamer sees is beautiful and wonderful in appearance, then it shows what he carries in his heart beautiful things, which is that he is a pure person who loves goodness for everyone, desires to form successful social relationships, and loves those who Turn it around. A lot. One of the happy signs associated with a dream about a red dress is that it shows the great success that a person will experience in the coming period, which means that he is surprised by the number of happy things he achieves in his life, whether related to studies. Or work and the other, the dreamer’s money increases if he sees the long and beautiful red dress, while he suffers from some problems if the dress is short or torn. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s red dress: Ibn Sirin shows some beautiful concepts that are highlighted by his wearing the red dress, as it is a sign of the happy things that he is experiencing. A person in his life, especially if he is prominent, which makes him calm and happy. If one sees a girl shining in beauty and wearing a red dress, the meaning indicates marriage if he is single, but if a married man sees his partner wearing this dress, this confirms success and goodness in his life. with her. Sometimes a girl sees a red dress and shows kindness in the dreams and ambitions that she can achieve and get rid of bad circumstances and current crises. Interpretation of a dream about a red dress for a single woman: A dream about a red dress indicates many beautiful meanings for a girl, as it confirms her positive and beautiful view of reality, so she tries to solve the crises that she is going through on the Immediately and do not tend to despair or frustration. They live in good conditions and are happy with their reality. Legalists believe that a long red dress is better than a short one in a single woman’s dream, as it indicates that she is a good and generous person, who wants to get married, while a short red dress can clarify some annoying matters or not complete them in her life. Her romantic life. Related.Interpretation of a dream about a red dress for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about a red dress for a married woman has many beautiful meanings. If she cares about wearing it and finds that it suits her and is beautiful, this indicates that she is trying to make her husband very happy and is looking for good and beautiful times to spend with him without problems, and if this dress is long This confirms the abundance of money that she can earn and turns her financial situation into excellent comfort. By seeing a red dress in a dream, it can be said that there are annoying situations happening to her. If it is very short or transparent, it indicates a lack of calm in reality and entering into many conflicts with others. the husband. As a result of lack of understanding and many differences in life, and if

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about clay and water from Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of a dream about removing clay with water, and the interpretation of a dream about clay and water at home

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about mud and water What some people see in a dream is one of the mixed dreams that may not be somewhat realistic, but in any case, we are used to strange visions and we find an interpretation for them with the imams of dream interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about mud and water What is the interpretation of a dream about mud and water? Whoever sees this dream in his dream should calm down a little and try to identify the mistakes he has made recently and which currently stand as an obstacle to what he aspires to and seeks to achieve. There are many interpretations that accompany this dream and differ according to the details as follows: The dream of mud and water often expresses the dreamer's fears that he has fallen into and the problems he finds in his work that may make him move away from his position. If he is married, he does not feel happy with his current wife and finds that there is a great deficiency towards him, but he may be wrong and only needs to open his heart to her and help him with everything that distracts her. From him. Seeing mud on the road and drowning in it without noticing it, indicates his involvement in something that has nothing to do with him, but rather means its consequences for a long time. Making statues from clay and water in his dream is a sign that he is not good at dealing with people and is not responsible for his actions. Rather, he is characterized by weakness of character and frivolity at times. But if he was playing and playing with mud and pouring water on it aimlessly, then there is something that occupies his mind and causes him great confusion and is often a problem for which he is looking for a solution. What is the interpretation of a dream about mud and water according to Ibn Sirin? It may express his failure to achieve goals and the accompanying feelings of depression that make him feel very sad. The Imam said that whoever aspires to have a place in society faces many obstacles, but he is able to overcome them. However, if he falls into them and turns around and leaves quickly, then in this case he finds himself on his way to happiness and abandons everything that concerns him and occupies his thoughts. Seeing him walking calmly on the mud and warning him not to fall into it is evidence that the dreamer is exposed to many temptations that he fears falling into one of them and wants not to approach them. However, if he walks on them in an easy way without fearing anything, and reaches the other side safely, then this is good evidence that his repentance is sincere, and he seeks to please the Merciful to accept his repentance and forgive him in the past. Sins. Through Google, you can join us on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site and Visions and you will find everything you do in it. Interpretation of a dream about mud and water for a single woman Falling into a pool of mud is a very disturbing dream for her, especially if there are some bad qualities that make her worry about what might happen to her as a punishment for what she did or is doing, she must return to the right path and stay away from sins. If he walks in the mud and finds it difficult to walk, he will carry a lot of burdens that he cannot do all of them. But if she falls into it, she is likely to stumble in her studies if she is currently seeking knowledge or cut off her relationship with a person who does not suit her in any way, but if she can stand and continue to stay away from then communicate with another person after a while, more equal

title: An abandoned house in a dream

preview.html: Entering an abandoned house indicates committing sins and transgressions. It also indicates sorrows, worries, and problems, and indicates the intense anxiety that the dreamer is preoccupied with in his life. Interpretation of seeing an abandoned house in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried girl sees that she is looking at an abandoned house in a dream, and she lives in it in A dream for a long time. It explains that she is far from worshiping God Almighty and that she is doing bad things in her life at this time, and God knows best. Either a single girl sees in a dream that she is looking at an abandoned house in a dream, and she is afraid of it, and she is far from it in the dream. She says that she is looking To the path of evil in her life and she was able to stay away from it and get closer to Almighty God in her life. What if she saw the abandoned house in a dream, and it was her house in the dream, and she is very upset about it and wants to change it. It indicates that she will try to get rid of doing bad things, which is what she does Right now and it is disturbing her. The unmarried girl who saw that she was married in a dream and living in an abandoned house in the dream, and felt very afraid. This is an indication that the unmarried girl will marry a disabled person in her life and this will make her very sad. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a house Large and spacious for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing an abandoned house in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that she sees in a dream the abandoned house, and tries to stay away from it a lot. She says that she looks at the sins in her life and fears God Almighty in her affairs and stays away from this matter. And seeing a married woman in a dream She lives in an abandoned house and felt very lonely. This is a sign that she is doing bad things in her life, and lives alone with her sins and bad deeds, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman sitting in an abandoned house in a dream for a long time without changing or getting bored of it. It explains that she will do wrong things. In her life and increases her abandonment of God Almighty and his worship. The married woman who was forced in a dream to enter the abandoned house and was trying to get out of it quickly. Here it indicates that she will face very difficult matters in her life, but she will get rid of them soon, God willing. Interpretation of seeing an abandoned house in a dream For a divorced woman, if the divorced woman dreams that the abandoned house is her former home in which she lives with her ex-husband. This indicates that she has previously done bad things in her life and has repented to God Almighty in repentance for his advice to him. And if a divorced woman sees in a dream that the abandoned house is very close to her home And she was going in and out of it. It appears that he will do bad things in his life, and he tries to stay away from her, but he returns to her again. As for the divorced woman who sees all her friends sitting inside the abandoned house in a dream, she is happy about it. This is a sign that she is doing bad things in her life. And it gets close to bad and evil people. Likewise, a divorced woman dreams of demolishing an abandoned house and finally getting rid of it in a dream. Here it indicates that she will get rid of some problems and bad things in her life and live happily, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a complicated house in the dream.
